https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/34U1HOVVqo9GtHk7s1l06fzehel.jpg The true story of the notorious paedophile priest Brendan Smyth, and how one family in Belfast, aided by journalist Chris Moore, uncovered the true extent of the clerical abuse scandal. Brendan Smyth: Betrayal of Trust
